message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's a rare opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to start the negotiations with a price of $1100000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this exceptional item.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $1000000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm getting closer to your offer, but I still need to ensure a fair price for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $1075000 for it. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Alice, I am committed to finding a fair price for both of us. I am willing to pay $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $1100000 for the product. Let's see if we can seal the deal at this price.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I am willing to pay $1075000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $1100000, Bob. I'm confident that this product is worth it to you, and I'm willing to meet you at $1100000. If not, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options.
